title: Kuusou no Sora Tobu Kikaitachi
synopsis: Animated 2002 short film produced by Studio Ghibli for their near exclusive use in the Ghibli Museum. It features famous director Miyazaki Hayao himself as narrator (in the form of a humanoid pig, reminiscent of Porco from Porco Rosso), telling the story of flight and the many machines imagined to achieve it.
staff: [['Suzuki, Toshio', ['Producer']], ['Miyazaki, Hayao', ['Director', ' Script', ' Screenplay', ' Original Creator']], ['Hisaishi, Joe', ['Music']], ['Yonebayashi, Hiromasa', ['Animation Director']]]
